vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀλόη, ἡ,
bitter aloes, Aloe vera, [Refs 1st c.AD+]
__2 ={ἀγάλλοχον}, [LXX] (in Heb. form ἀλώθ), [NT]
__3 ἀ. γαλλική, ={γεντιανή}, Ps.-[Refs 1st c.AD+]
__4 ἀ. ἡπατῖτις, hepatic aloes, Aloe Perryi, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
aloes
aloe, lign-aloe, a tree which grows in India and Cochin-China, the wood of which is soft and bitter, though highly aromatic. It is used by the Orientals as a perfume; and employed for the purposes of embalming, Jn. 19:39*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: áloes (savia de un árbol aromático que se usa para un ungüento para los entierros)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沉香 (約 19:39)
一種生長於印度與中國的香料樹.東方人用其柔軟帶苦味的木頭香薰屍首.
樹木可長至120呎高,40呎粗.
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
沉香 (约 19:39)
一种生长于印度与中国的香料树.东方人用其柔软带苦味的木头香熏尸首.
树木可长至120呎高,40呎粗.
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: trầm hương; một dược hòa với lư hội; cây lô hội
